docs.lead_paragraph: For more than two weeks, a stench of feces, ammonium and laundry detergent wafted through the air in the southwestern corner of the continental United States. Residents who contacted government offices got no answers.

headline.print_headline: Mexican Sewage Spill Flares US Noses and Tempers
headline.main: Mexican Sewage Spill Flares US Noses and Tempers

docs.lead_paragraph: More shrubs moving onto Arctic tundra because of climate change will have minimal effect on many of the bird species that breed there, but birds likely will seek other habitat when the shrubs grow tall, according to a new federal study.

headline.print_headline: Warming, Taller Shrubs May Affect Birds Breeding on Tundra
headline.main: Warming, Taller Shrubs May Affect Birds Breeding on Tundra

docs.lead_paragraph: Singer Trey Songz has declined to accept an offer that would have reduced a felony assault charge stemming from a concert appearance in Detroit to a misdemeanor.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United Auto Workers union charges that Nissan Motor Co. broke federal labor law less than two days before a Mississippi rally where U.S. Sen. Bernie Sanders plans to speak in favor of unionization.
